titles.title: A bill for the relief of Shelton Anthony Smith.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the classification of a named individual as a child within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act. Directs the Attorney General to adjust that individual's status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence.
